summary: I AM CURRENTLY HAVING A PROBLEM WITH MY FUEL TANK LEAKING.  I LOOKED ON LINE AND NOTICED THE CARS IN THE NORTHERN PART OF THE U.S. WERE RECALLED FOR THIS PROBLEM.  WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHY ALL CARS WERE NOT RECALLED AND IF IT CAN STILL BE REPLACED.   THANK-YOU.  NLM    **DIMSII  IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS*734297
